list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay Away From Binance
list_of_reviews.review: I had given a ftmo prop firm account to a customer which was worth 500$.Gave Him The Logins After Got paid by Binance & Never Got Any Text By Him.After a week He Lost the account cuz of his stupid & Reported Binance For Refund.I Provided Full Chat Recording with him in which i had provided the logins & said "Enjoy".After That I Texted Him again but he deleted full chat on Telegram & Blocked Me.Now The Binance support is saying that i did some fraudulent activity & now i have to refund 500$.I only Got 10$ in my pocket from which he had sent & gave him account.Now what the heck type of justice is this.They are asking me to give my 6 months of profit in one go.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Never ever use Binance Launchpool

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful experience
list_of_reviews.review: Awful experience. Lack of guidance in the app leading to unnecessary fees and forcing me to remove everything and lose lots of money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience
list_of_reviews.review: Binance has locked my account with a lot of fund for over 4 months now. I have been using Binance for over 2 years and have never violated any of their rules. One day, they suddenly locked my account and refused to allow any fund withdrawals. I provided all the information they requested through the chat window, but they robotically repeat messages, telling me they cannot provide any information about the account review and to patiently wait.I even wrote a letter to Binance's CEO, Mr. Teng, but received no response. Additionally, their customer service is the worst. Despite numerous chats with customer support over 4 months, they mentally harassed me by deflecting issues back and forth and, in some cases, closing the case without resolving the problem, intentionally it seems.The money locked by Binance constitutes a significant portion of my family's finances. My family has been unhappy throughout these periods. Eventually, I fell into depression and had to seek treatment from a doctor due to the mental and financial abuse.This is clearly psychological abuse and financial extortion. I plan to take legal action on this matter and share my dreadful experience on social media. My case number is 121154260. If this issue is resolved promptly, I will update my review.

list_of_reviews.review_title: PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS STEELING EXCHANGE
list_of_reviews.review: Hi,Honestly I thought that Binance  is one of the Best Crypto Exchange Companies, but today I fund out the opposite.I have nothing to gain or loose from this review, but PEOPLE HAVE TO KNOW THE TRUTH.DURING OPEN POSITION, I WAS TAKING SELL SHORT, MY POSITION WAS AUTOMATICALLY CLOSED AND FUNDS STOLEN.THE PERCENTAGE IS ALSO NOT ALWAYS CORRECT ON FUTURES TRADING.WHEN I CONTACTED CUSTOMER SUPPORT THEY TOLD ME THEY DID LIQUIDATION, OF COURSE WHEN WE ARE WINNING MONEY THEY DONT WANT TO GIVE THEM.IN ONE CENTENCE CRIMINAL STEALING PEOPLE!PLEASE DONT USE THIS EXCHANGE YOU WILL GET SCAMMED!YOUR MONEY IS NOT SAFE!!!THEY ARE ALSO GOING TO BE REPORTED TO THE REGULATORY COMMISSION FOR EXCHANGE OFFICE'S.SincerelyChris

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not use binance

list_of_reviews.review_title: It always take 30 minutes to withdraw…
list_of_reviews.review: It always take 30 minutes to withdraw USDC via AVAX chain even when it's non-congested (as I have tested). Someone should change the the "~2 mins" Arrival Time to 30 mins because incompetent devs cannot stop being incompetent. And users have better stuff to do than waiting 30 minutes for one withdrawal Every. Single. Time.Case ID for reference: 120140056

list_of_reviews.review_title: Incapable Customer support
list_of_reviews.review: My feedback is regarding BinanceUS which is the U.S. exchange arm of Binance.I have attempted to open an Institutional account with them which requires submitting business documents for verification.Their standard wait time for approval is 2 weeks and the site recommends to contact support if not completed in this time frame.  It has now been 4 weeks and I have contacted support agents at least 3 times since.  These people (only available via chat) have been completely useless; they cannot provide any information regarding status or timing for approval, or even if anyone has even reviewed any of the documents.They cannot escalate me to anyone who is capable of helping with the issue.  They only claim that someone from their email support team will contact me at sometime in the future but cannot provide any timing for that either.  It has been 2 weeks since my first contact with support and to date I have received no contact whatsoever.  Additionally every agent always end the chat with a flag that says "This issue has been marked as solved" when it clearly is not.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Extremely difficult to withdraw money
list_of_reviews.review: Binance makes getting your money out of their platform harder and harder with every update to the point where successfully navigating their maze-like menus is not possible without contacting support. Support is not professional and poorly trained. This is probably due to the fact that they get laid off every year so Binance can avoid paying out yearly bonuses.Do not put your money on this app.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The Binance had frozen my withdrawal…
list_of_reviews.review: The Binance had frozen my withdrawal more than 1 year the reason that they want me show them all the transaction evidence if they found my transaction are illegal why not just stop my transaction on that time instead of my pass 3 months evidence, Mr zk the owner also been accused as Aml why he has rights to frozen my accounts ?

list_of_reviews.review_title: No proper customer care!!
list_of_reviews.review: No proper customer care!!I am writing this review on behalf of my friend.To be true it was going good upto last month with Binance but this time fed-up.Last month we took USDT from one of Binance advertiser thru P2P. Amount paid thru UPI and deducted from bank account. Its one month we keep asking to release USDT but not yet released. It was reported to Binance after waiting 3 days but nothing happened.Its one month now, If we are going to report again or appeal, its Binance msg showing that you already reported and under process. I am not sure if the messages / conversation is good to be share on this plateform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Great performance, great support

Four stars only since the trading on the integrated platform could really be improved and enhanced by features like tickcharts, quick and precise OCOs, or a simple fullscreen-mode for the trading interface when its used in the browser.

They are accumulating the money and never returned as they are playing with greed of humans. Some day they will disappear with all your money. Please don't invest this shi*tty app you can also read down all reviews are against them. Every should write against their scamming in Google and play store as well . overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of Binance reveal a mixed user experience, with the majority expressing significant dissatisfaction with the platform's customer care, suggesting a need for improvement in customer support and service. Users have reported specific issues such as blocked transfers, unnecessary fees, and unresponsiveness, indicating operational inefficiencies that could be addressed to enhance user satisfaction. There are serious allegations of funds being stolen during trading, automatic position closures, and inaccurate percentages in futures trading, which raise concerns about the platform's reliability and trustworthiness. The outlier review with a 4-star rating commends the platform's performance and support, hinting at a possible variance in service quality received by different users. To regain user trust, Binance should investigate the claims of stolen funds, address the inaccuracies in trading, and ensure consistent and high-quality customer support across all user interactions.

list_of_reviews.review: I had given a ftmo prop firm account to a customer which was worth 500$.Gave Him The Logins After Got paid by Binance & Never Got Any Text By Him.After a week He Lost the account cuz of his stupid & Reported Binance For Refund.I Provided Full Chat Recording with him in which i had provided the logins & said "Enjoy".After That I Texted Him again but he deleted full chat on Telegram & Blocked Me.Now The Binance support is saying that i did some fraudulent activity & now i have to refund 500$.I only Got 10$ in my pocket from which he had sent & gave him account.Now what the heck type of justice is this.They are asking me to give my 6 months of profit in one go.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Never ever use Binance Launchpool
list_of_reviews.review: Never ever use Binance Launchpool, such a scam saying on my PNL of my holding in this token 900$+ and then it says I lost 400$. Never use it. Customer service won't do anything about it. Put your money else where except there.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful experience
list_of_reviews.review: Awful experience. Lack of guidance in the app leading to unnecessary fees and forcing me to remove everything and lose lots of money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Thief agreed to refund but Binance refuse
list_of_reviews.review: I lost USDT from my wallet and deposit was made to Binance. I have been contacting Binance customer support team several times to refund money but they refuses to do it. Thief already agreed to refund and he had a chat with Binance to refund. But Binance refuses to do it. I don't know why they are making work too complicated. They suggested me to report police but they are new to this and hard to handle this. It charges much fee as well. I don't want to make this complicate and hope to resolve without the help of local police.I hope someone from Binance or global law enforcement agency that can resolve this in a short period can contact me.Chat ID: #120805724, #120845562

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience
list_of_reviews.review: Binance has locked my account with a lot of fund for over 4 months now. I have been using Binance for over 2 years and have never violated any of their rules. One day, they suddenly locked my account and refused to allow any fund withdrawals. I provided all the information they requested through the chat window, but they robotically repeat messages, telling me they cannot provide any information about the account review and to patiently wait.I even wrote a letter to Binance's CEO, Mr. Teng, but received no response. Additionally, their customer service is the worst. Despite numerous chats with customer support over 4 months, they mentally harassed me by deflecting issues back and forth and, in some cases, closing the case without resolving the problem, intentionally it seems.The money locked by Binance constitutes a significant portion of my family's finances. My family has been unhappy throughout these periods. Eventually, I fell into depression and had to seek treatment from a doctor due to the mental and financial abuse.This is clearly psychological abuse and financial extortion. I plan to take legal action on this matter and share my dreadful experience on social media. My case number is 121154260. If this issue is resolved promptly, I will update my review.

list_of_reviews.review_title: PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS STEELING EXCHANGE
list_of_reviews.review: Hi,Honestly I thought that Binance  is one of the Best Crypto Exchange Companies, but today I fund out the opposite.I have nothing to gain or loose from this review, but PEOPLE HAVE TO KNOW THE TRUTH.DURING OPEN POSITION, I WAS TAKING SELL SHORT, MY POSITION WAS AUTOMATICALLY CLOSED AND FUNDS STOLEN.THE PERCENTAGE IS ALSO NOT ALWAYS CORRECT ON FUTURES TRADING.WHEN I CONTACTED CUSTOMER SUPPORT THEY TOLD ME THEY DID LIQUIDATION, OF COURSE WHEN WE ARE WINNING MONEY THEY DONT WANT TO GIVE THEM.IN ONE CENTENCE CRIMINAL STEALING PEOPLE!PLEASE DONT USE THIS EXCHANGE YOU WILL GET SCAMMED!YOUR MONEY IS NOT SAFE!!!THEY ARE ALSO GOING TO BE REPORTED TO THE REGULATORY COMMISSION FOR EXCHANGE OFFICE'S.SincerelyChris

Someone should change the the "~2 mins" Arrival Time to 30 mins because incompetent devs cannot stop being incompetent. And users have better stuff to do than waiting 30 minutes for one withdrawal Every. Single. Time.Case ID for reference: 120140056

list_of_reviews.review_title: Incapable Customer support
list_of_reviews.review: My feedback is regarding BinanceUS which is the U.S. exchange arm of Binance.I have attempted to open an Institutional account with them which requires submitting business documents for verification.Their standard wait time for approval is 2 weeks and the site recommends to contact support if not completed in this time frame.  It has now been 4 weeks and I have contacted support agents at least 3 times since.  These people (only available via chat) have been completely useless; they cannot provide any information regarding status or timing for approval, or even if anyone has even reviewed any of the documents.They cannot escalate me to anyone who is capable of helping with the issue.  They only claim that someone from their email support team will contact me at sometime in the future but cannot provide any timing for that either.  It has been 2 weeks since my first contact with support and to date I have received no contact whatsoever.  Additionally every agent always end the chat with a flag that says "This issue has been marked as solved" when it clearly is not.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Extremely difficult to withdraw money
list_of_reviews.review: Binance makes getting your money out of their platform harder and harder with every update to the point where successfully navigating their maze-like menus is not possible without contacting support. Support is not professional and poorly trained. This is probably due to the fact that they get laid off every year so Binance can avoid paying out yearly bonuses.Do not put your money on this app.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Great performance, great support
list_of_reviews.review: Clearly the best support I´ve seen so far. Besides this Binance is still the most liquid exchange with best limit execution and plenty of assets, way more than in comparison to the most. The API also allows for massive data transfer in order to be used with external apps, extremely performant. Four stars only since the trading on the integrated platform could really be improved and enhanced by features like tickcharts, quick and precise OCOs, or a simple fullscreen-mode for the trading interface when its used in the browser.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The Binance had frozen my withdrawal…
list_of_reviews.review: The Binance had frozen my withdrawal more than 1 year the reason that they want me show them all the transaction evidence if they found my transaction are illegal why not just stop my transaction on that time instead of my pass 3 months evidence, Mr zk the owner also been accused as Aml why he has rights to frozen my accounts ?

list_of_reviews.review_title: No proper customer care!!
list_of_reviews.review: No proper customer care!!I am writing this review on behalf of my friend.To be true it was going good upto last month with Binance but this time fed-up.Last month we took USDT from one of Binance advertiser thru P2P. Amount paid thru UPI and deducted from bank account. Its one month we keep asking to release USDT but not yet released. It was reported to Binance after waiting 3 days but nothing happened.Its one month now, If we are going to report again or appeal, its Binance msg showing that you already reported and under process. I am not sure if the messages / conversation is good to be share on this plateform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I experienced fake advert on USD for…

The thing is when I sold my usdt, it will appear according to the advert rate in USD. But this guys go against the binance rules buy telling that they don't buy USD. they only buy USDT.  This is very frustrating. Because I just lost my money on binance. Freeze any fraudulent account to teach them a lesson.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fiat transfers blocked, no reply, many weeks just wasted
list_of_reviews.review: Registered, verified (took about a month!), signed all documents, but then all fiat transfers blocked. Numerous reminders sent, absolutely no reply. Wasted many weeks for being treated like crap!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience
list_of_reviews.review: Binance has locked my account with a lot of fund for over 4 months now. I have been using Binance for over 2 years and have never violated any of their rules. One day, they suddenly locked my account and refused to allow any fund withdrawals. I provided all the information they requested through the chat window, but they robotically repeat messages, telling me they cannot provide any information about the account review and to patiently wait.I even wrote a letter to Binance's CEO, Mr. Teng, but received no response. Additionally, their customer service is the worst. Despite numerous chats with customer support over 4 months, they mentally harassed me by deflecting issues back and forth and, in some cases, closing the case without resolving the problem, intentionally it seems.The money locked by Binance constitutes a significant portion of my family's finances. My family has been unhappy throughout these periods. Eventually, I fell into depression and had to seek treatment from a doctor due to the mental and financial abuse.This is clearly psychological abuse and financial extortion. I plan to take legal action on this matter and share my dreadful experience on social media. My case number is 121154260. If this issue is resolved promptly, I will update my review.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Thief agreed to refund but Binance refuse
list_of_reviews.review: I lost USDT from my wallet and deposit was made to Binance. I have been contacting Binance customer support team several times to refund money but they refuses to do it. Thief already agreed to refund and he had a chat with Binance to refund. But Binance refuses to do it. I don't know why they are making work too complicated. They suggested me to report police but they are new to this and hard to handle this. It charges much fee as well. I don't want to make this complicate and hope to resolve without the help of local police.I hope someone from Binance or global law enforcement agency that can resolve this in a short period can contact me.Chat ID: #120805724, #120845562

So they blocked the incoming transfer for months, and I claimed it back from my bank.No matter how many times I have contacted support. Support is useless. they understand nothing.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware of Deceptive Trader Labels on Binance
list_of_reviews.review: [Update] Case ID #121488440I feel compelled to share my experience with Binance in the hope of preventing others from falling victim to their deceptive practices. As a user of their platform, I was led to believe that I was investing with reputable traders based on the labels and tags assigned to their profiles by binance themselves. However, it quickly became apparent that these labels were nothing more than a facade designed to lure unsuspecting investors.One such trader, 'Jasmine_Gemhunter88', was prominently labeled as a 'Top performer' and touted as the 'best trader for new copiers'. Trusting in these endorsements from Binance, I invested a significant portion of my savings in copying this trader's trades, only to discover that their strategies were reckless and irresponsible.Instead of following sound trading principles, 'Jasmine_Gemhunter88' engaged in actions that resulted in substantial losses for myself and many others. It became evident that Binance's labeling system was misleading and did not accurately reflect the trader's true performance or intentions.I urge anyone considering using Binance to exercise caution and thoroughly research any traders they may be considering copying. Do not rely solely on the labels and tags provided by Binance, as they are not accurately represent the trader's actual performance or level of trustworthiness. The most obvious evidence of this that after my loss and complaints to binance they removed those tags from that trader's account.In conclusion, my experience with Binance has been one of disappointment and huge financial loss. I hope that by sharing my story, others can avoid falling into the same trap and protect themselves from similar experiences.Stay vigilant and beware of Binance's deceptive trader labels.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience

Despite numerous chats with customer support over 4 months, they mentally harassed me by deflecting issues back and forth and, in some cases, closing the case without resolving the problem, intentionally it seems.The money locked by Binance constitutes a significant portion of my family's finances. My family has been unhappy throughout these periods. Eventually, I fell into depression and had to seek treatment from a doctor due to the mental and financial abuse.This is clearly psychological abuse and financial extortion. I plan to take legal action on this matter and share my dreadful experience on social media. My case number is 121154260. If this issue is resolved promptly, I will update my review.

prompts_output.Output: Common areas of concern or praise for binance.com include "smooth transactions," "process clarity," "poor customer service," "impersonal responses," "excessive promotions," "efficient transactions," "security," "platform speed," "high commissions," and "limited cryptocurrency options."

prompts_output.Output:
Summary:
"Users appreciate smooth transactions and clear processes but are frustrated by poor customer service, impersonal responses, and excessive promotions."

Explanation:
This summary captures the main points of user satisfaction with transactions and dissatisfaction with customer support and promotional content.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize smooth transactions, process understanding, and successful large deposits. Negative reviews focus on poor customer service, lack of personal engagement, and excessive promotional language. Key differentiators are user satisfaction with transaction processes versus dissatisfaction with customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the binance.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Despite a 1-star rating and a "Fraud company" title, the review praises Binance's customer support for being prompt, polite, knowledgeable, and effective in resolving issues, indicating high effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a clear dichotomy between user satisfaction with transaction processes and dissatisfaction with customer support. Positive feedback highlights smooth transactions, a good understanding of processes, and successful handling of large deposits. However, negative reviews are dominated by complaints about poor customer service, lack of personal engagement, and excessive use of promotional language. The critical issues identified are the need for improved customer support and more personalized engagement. To enhance overall user experience, it is suggested to focus on training customer service representatives, reducing promotional content, and fostering a more personalized approach to customer interactions.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware of Binance: A Cautionary Tale
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I had read the warning signs before diving into the abyss of Binance. My experience with this platform has been nothing short of a nightmare. From their opaque fee structures to their questionable customer service, Binance epitomizes everything that's wrong with the cryptocurrency exchange industry.First and foremost, let's talk about their fees. Hidden charges seem to be Binance's specialty. What starts as a seemingly low transaction fee quickly balloons into an exorbitant sum when you try to withdraw your funds. And good luck trying to decipher their fee schedule – it's like navigating a maze designed to confuse and frustrate unsuspecting users.But the real kicker is their customer service – or lack thereof. It's like shouting into the void. When you encounter an issue, which you inevitably will, don't expect any timely resolution or even a semblance of human interaction. Binance's customer support is as responsive as a brick wall, leaving you stranded with your problems and your dwindling faith in humanity.And let's not forget about security – or the lack thereof. Binance has had its fair share of security breaches, leaving users vulnerable to hacks and theft. It's a ticking time bomb waiting to explode, and you're left holding the bag when it inevitably does.In conclusion, steer clear of Binance unless you enjoy financial frustration and existential dread. There are plenty of other cryptocurrency exchanges out there that actually value their customers and prioritize transparency and security. Don't make the same mistake I did – run, don't walk, away from Binance. Your sanity and your bank account will thank you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: literally stealing
list_of_reviews.review: Title: Beware: Binance's Trust DeficitRating: ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)Review:I'm deeply disappointed with my recent experience with Binance. What started as a promising platform for cryptocurrency trading has quickly devolved into a nightmare of lost funds and abysmal customer service.This morning, I reached out to Binance's customer service regarding a glaring discrepancy in my account. Despite depositing approximately $950 into my Ethereum account and only withdrawing around $350, there's a glaring gap of $600 or $550, considering fees. Basic arithmetic, right? Not according to Binance's customer service team, who seemed intent on gaslighting me into doubting my own sanity.Their feeble attempts at explanation, pointing fingers at Bitcoin transactions and other vague excuses, only compounded my frustration. The ledger doesn't lie, and there's simply no accounting for the missing funds. It's not just about the money; it's about the lack of transparency and accountability from a platform I once trusted with my investments.To add insult to injury, my account balance now reads a measly $28, a laughable sum considering the significant investment I've made. It feels like nothing short of robbery. In light of this egregious mishandling of funds and appalling customer service, I've withdrawn over $10,000 from Binance and vowed never to return.In conclusion, steer clear of Binance unless you want to risk losing your hard-earned money to a company that seems more interested in making excuses than resolving issues. Trust is the bedrock of any financial institution, and unfortunately, Binance has shattered that trust beyond repair.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am deeply disappointed with Binance's…
list_of_reviews.review: I am deeply disappointed with Binance's services. Without any prior warning or valid explanation, they deactivated my account, leaving me completely stranded and unable to access my funds. I certainly will not be recommending Binance to anyone after this regrettable experience.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the binance.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a dichotomy in user experiences, with positive feedback highlighting the company's transparency, compliance, and legitimate business strategies, which underscore its regulatory adherence and business integrity. Conversely, negative reviews criticize the frequent use of repetitive call-to-action phrases, multiple links, and suggest the presence of bot-generated content, pointing to concerns over automated and impersonal interactions. Key themes include the balance between authenticity and regulatory focus versus the drawbacks of perceived automation and high fees. Critical issues identified are the impersonal nature of interactions and potential support scams, which undermine user trust. To improve, the company should address these concerns by reducing automated content, enhancing personalized customer support, and ensuring website functionality to build a more trustworthy and user-friendly experience.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance
list_of_reviews.review: Binance, one of the world's largest and most popular cryptocurrency exchanges, prides itself on its efficient services and quick customer response times. However, recently, there has been a noticeable slowdown in their customer support department, leaving many users frustrated and dissatisfied.As a loyal Binance user for several years, I have always found their customer service to be top-notch. Any issues I encountered were swiftly resolved, and I could always count on a timely response from their team. So, when I found myself facing an unexpected problem with my account, I naturally turned to Binance for help.To my surprise, days passed with no response from their customer support team. I sent multiple messages through their website and social media channels, but all I received were automated responses assuring me that my inquiry was being looked into. Frustration began to set in as I watched my issue go unresolved, and I couldn't help but wonder what had caused this sudden delay in their usually prompt customer service.As more time passed, I started to see similar complaints from other users on online forums and social media platforms. Many were experiencing long wait times and delayed responses from Binance's support team, with some reporting that they had been waiting for weeks without any resolution to their problems.The once shining reputation of Binance's customer service was starting to tarnish, and users were becoming increasingly disillusioned with the exchange. Rumors began to circulate about possible internal issues within the company, causing the slowdown in customer support response times.Despite the setbacks, I remained hopeful that Binance would address the issue and restore their previous level of customer service excellence. As a valuable and loyal customer, I believed that they would do everything in their power to rectify the situation and regain the trust of their users.In the end, Binance did take steps to improve their customer support response times, hiring additional staff and implementing new systems to streamline their processes. The slowdown was eventually resolved, and once again, users could rely on Binance for efficient and effective customer service.Through this experience, I learned that even the most reliable and reputable companies can face challenges that affect their ability to provide top-notch service. It is during these times of struggle that true customer loyalty is tested, and I am pleased to say that Binance passed the test with flying colors in my book.

list_of_reviews.review_title: literally stealing
list_of_reviews.review: Title: Beware: Binance's Trust DeficitRating: ★☆☆☆☆ (1/5)Review:I'm deeply disappointed with my recent experience with Binance. What started as a promising platform for cryptocurrency trading has quickly devolved into a nightmare of lost funds and abysmal customer service.This morning, I reached out to Binance's customer service regarding a glaring discrepancy in my account. Despite depositing approximately $950 into my Ethereum account and only withdrawing around $350, there's a glaring gap of $600 or $550, considering fees. Basic arithmetic, right? Not according to Binance's customer service team, who seemed intent on gaslighting me into doubting my own sanity.Their feeble attempts at explanation, pointing fingers at Bitcoin transactions and other vague excuses, only compounded my frustration. The ledger doesn't lie, and there's simply no accounting for the missing funds. It's not just about the money; it's about the lack of transparency and accountability from a platform I once trusted with my investments.To add insult to injury, my account balance now reads a measly $28, a laughable sum considering the significant investment I've made. It feels like nothing short of robbery. In light of this egregious mishandling of funds and appalling customer service, I've withdrawn over $10,000 from Binance and vowed never to return.In conclusion, steer clear of Binance unless you want to risk losing your hard-earned money to a company that seems more interested in making excuses than resolving issues. Trust is the bedrock of any financial institution, and unfortunately, Binance has shattered that trust beyond repair.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable and Unresponsive: Binance Blocked My Deposits
list_of_reviews.review: I have been a Binance user for quite some time, but my recent experience has been nothing short of frustrating. Since June 1st, 2024, Binance has inexplicably blocked my deposits without any clear reason. Despite being able to withdraw funds, the lack of transparency and communication from their support team is unacceptable.Every time I contact their support, I receive the same vague response: "your case is under review." No additional details or timelines are provided. I have reached out multiple times each day, hoping for a resolution, but to no avail.I turned to various platforms like Reddit, Twitter, and Trustpilot, and found numerous posts from other users experiencing similar issues with Binance freezing accounts without justification. This prompted me to move all my funds to my Ledger hardware wallet for safety.As a result, I no longer trust Binance and strongly advise others to consider safer alternatives like Trust Wallet or MetaMask. Binance's current practices are not only unreliable but also unsafe.Cons:Blocked deposits without clear reason.Unhelpful and repetitive support responses.Numerous reports of similar issues from other users.I hope Binance addresses these issues promptly, but until then, I cannot recommend their services.Case ID #122977425

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable and Unresponsive: Binance Blocked My Deposits
list_of_reviews.review: I have been a Binance user for quite some time, but my recent experience has been nothing short of frustrating. Since June 1st, 2024, Binance has inexplicably blocked my deposits without any clear reason. Despite being able to withdraw funds, the lack of transparency and communication from their support team is unacceptable.Every time I contact their support, I receive the same vague response: "your case is under review." No additional details or timelines are provided. I have reached out multiple times each day, hoping for a resolution, but to no avail.I turned to various platforms like Reddit, Twitter, and Trustpilot, and found numerous posts from other users experiencing similar issues with Binance freezing accounts without justification. This prompted me to move all my funds to my Ledger hardware wallet for safety.As a result, I no longer trust Binance and strongly advise others to consider safer alternatives like Trust Wallet or MetaMask. Binance's current practices are not only unreliable but also unsafe.Cons:Blocked deposits without clear reason.Unhelpful and repetitive support responses.Numerous reports of similar issues from other users.I hope Binance addresses these issues promptly, but until then, I cannot recommend their services.Case ID #122977425

No additional details or timelines are provided. I have reached out multiple times each day, hoping for a resolution, but to no avail.I turned to various platforms like Reddit, Twitter, and Trustpilot, and found numerous posts from other users experiencing similar issues with Binance freezing accounts without justification. This prompted me to move all my funds to my Ledger hardware wallet for safety.As a result, I no longer trust Binance and strongly advise others to consider safer alternatives like Trust Wallet or MetaMask. list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance scammed me for 7 500 eur
list_of_reviews.review: 23rd of March 2024 someone opened a order on Binance P2P with me on the amount 7 500 eur. I paid the order and then waited for the seller to release the deal, but seller told me to contact with him in telegram to discuss details. He sent me his telegram handle and asked to contact with him, which I did. I've contacted with the seller and asked to release crypto, since he received everything, but seller instead asked me to pay him a fee to close the order. Seller received payment in full and wanted to scam me for a fee.I've contacted with the Binance team and asked them to release crypto, because seller didn't want to do it and I had a proof of him being a scammer. Binance decided to ask for proof from seller and... That's it. 3 months passed and they still wasting my time waiting for the seller to provide ANY evidence. Seller one time provided invalid evidence of him logging into the bank and showing ALMOST zero balance, claiming that he never received anything, but he never really show the transaction history (he didn't even go to transaction history in the app) and ignored all the Binance requests to do so. From the other side, I provided Binance with all the evidence of payment being completed and received by the seller's bank, including evidence of seller confirming he received everything in full and just waiting for me to pay him a fee.So, 3 months passed, Binance has all the evidence of seller being a scammer, who received all the money, and they still decided to freeze crypto and not letting me get my money.Seller is still requesting me to pay him a fee and never answer Binance requests to provide ANY proof.That's it folks. If you work with Binance p2p, be sure to understand that Binance will do everything to save themselves and they don't care about your funds. Even if you paid, even if you provided all the evidence, they don't care. They are going to freeze your money forever while probably earning by using them on their platform, and you are just going to wait for eternity, for nothing.Oh, and yeah, they don't even care I am from Ukraine and that I really need this money... This is a HUGE amount of money they are freezing and they do nothing for me to receive my money back.Thank you, Binance, for robbing me for 7500 eur!Never trust in this company, never use their services, they don't care about you and your funds!My p2p order number on Binance platform is 20604863135175593984Update 14 Jul 2024:I provided all the evidence once again with fresh video proof, and the binance support confirmed in the appeal chat that they are releasing the order, but... They are "releasing" it already a week :)) They are literally confirmed in the chat that the order is being released, and they still didn't release me my crypto... I am asking support when are they going to really release the deal, but they keep extending the appeal for another 24 hours, and then another 24 hours, and then another 48 HOURS, etc..! Terrible support, terrible service!Update 18 Jul 2024:The order was released, but now the support froze my funds and asked me to revert them to scammer. I PAID IN FULL FOR THE DEAL, and now they want to be DOUBLE PAY! ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! I provided all of the evidence ONCE AGAIN that I paid completely, and Binance asked me to wait for the scam-seller to confirm that there is everything OK with the payment... SERIOUSLY?! SO, I paid to this scam on YOUR platform, YOU received every proof from me that the payment was done, YOU made me wait 4 months already, YOU received the proof that seller IS a scammer, AND NOW you want me to wait for him to confirm if everything is ok?!?!?!?! This platform is a b*llh*t. Binance DOES NOT care about your funds, about your payments, they don't care about YOU! They are torchuring you for months and even further, until you give up on your funds. NEVER TRUST this platform. NEVER USE this scam-binance platform!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance scammed me for 7 500 eur
list_of_reviews.review: 23rd of March 2024 someone opened a order on Binance P2P with me on the amount 7 500 eur. I paid the order and then waited for the seller to release the deal, but seller told me to contact with him in telegram to discuss details. He sent me his telegram handle and asked to contact with him, which I did. I've contacted with the seller and asked to release crypto, since he received everything, but seller instead asked me to pay him a fee to close the order. Seller received payment in full and wanted to scam me for a fee.I've contacted with the Binance team and asked them to release crypto, because seller didn't want to do it and I had a proof of him being a scammer. Binance decided to ask for proof from seller and... That's it. 3 months passed and they still wasting my time waiting for the seller to provide ANY evidence. Seller one time provided invalid evidence of him logging into the bank and showing ALMOST zero balance, claiming that he never received anything, but he never really show the transaction history (he didn't even go to transaction history in the app) and ignored all the Binance requests to do so. From the other side, I provided Binance with all the evidence of payment being completed and received by the seller's bank, including evidence of seller confirming he received everything in full and just waiting for me to pay him a fee.So, 3 months passed, Binance has all the evidence of seller being a scammer, who received all the money, and they still decided to freeze crypto and not letting me get my money.Seller is still requesting me to pay him a fee and never answer Binance requests to provide ANY proof.That's it folks. If you work with Binance p2p, be sure to understand that Binance will do everything to save themselves and they don't care about your funds. Even if you paid, even if you provided all the evidence, they don't care. They are going to freeze your money forever while probably earning by using them on their platform, and you are just going to wait for eternity, for nothing.Oh, and yeah, they don't even care I am from Ukraine and that I really need this money... This is a HUGE amount of money they are freezing and they do nothing for me to receive my money back.Thank you, Binance, for robbing me for 7500 eur!Never trust in this company, never use their services, they don't care about you and your funds!My p2p order number on Binance platform is 20604863135175593984Update 14 Jul 2024:I provided all the evidence once again with fresh video proof, and the binance support confirmed in the appeal chat that they are releasing the order, but... They are "releasing" it already a week :)) They are literally confirmed in the chat that the order is being released, and they still didn't release me my crypto... I am asking support when are they going to really release the deal, but they keep extending the appeal for another 24 hours, and then another 24 hours, and then another 48 HOURS, etc..! Terrible support, terrible service!Update 18 Jul 2024:The order was released, but now the support froze my funds and asked me to revert them to scammer. I PAID IN FULL FOR THE DEAL, and now they want to be DOUBLE PAY! ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! I provided all of the evidence ONCE AGAIN that I paid completely, and Binance asked me to wait for the scam-seller to confirm that there is everything OK with the payment... SERIOUSLY?! SO, I paid to this scam on YOUR platform, YOU received every proof from me that the payment was done, YOU made me wait 4 months already, YOU received the proof that seller IS a scammer, AND NOW you want me to wait for him to confirm if everything is ok?!?!?!?! This platform is a b*llh*t. Binance DOES NOT care about your funds, about your payments, they don't care about YOU! They are torchuring you for months and even further, until you give up on your funds. NEVER TRUST this platform. NEVER USE this scam-binance platform!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am extremely disappointed with them
list_of_reviews.review: I appreciate the response from Binance here, but I feel compelled to provide additional context regarding my attempts to resolve this issue.I have tried to contact Binance through the email and live chat methods provided. Unfortunately, I did not receive a response via email, and I encountered technical issues with the live chat system. As a visitor, the system failed to send verification codes to my email or phone number, which led me to give up on that approach.In my quest for a solution, I found the email address in the privacy section of Binance's website and sent a detailed request there, including multiple forms of identification and proof of address. I provided all necessary details to verify my identity and prove I am the account holder. However, the only response I received was a request for the last location from which I accessed my account, which is difficult to provide due to the use of privacy protection measures.I understand the importance of security, but I believe it should be applied reasonably based on the specific case. In my situation, I am not requesting sensitive information, as I have already provided my own data. I am simply asking for my transaction history, which is crucial for my tax purposes.Unfortunately, I do not have a Case ID, as I have not been provided with one during this process. I have not received further assistance despite my numerous attempts and providing ample identification.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am extremely disappointed with them
list_of_reviews.review: I appreciate the response from Binance here, but I feel compelled to provide additional context regarding my attempts to resolve this issue.I have tried to contact Binance through the email and live chat methods provided. Unfortunately, I did not receive a response via email, and I encountered technical issues with the live chat system. As a visitor, the system failed to send verification codes to my email or phone number, which led me to give up on that approach.In my quest for a solution, I found the email address in the privacy section of Binance's website and sent a detailed request there, including multiple forms of identification and proof of address. I provided all necessary details to verify my identity and prove I am the account holder. However, the only response I received was a request for the last location from which I accessed my account, which is difficult to provide due to the use of privacy protection measures.I understand the importance of security, but I believe it should be applied reasonably based on the specific case. In my situation, I am not requesting sensitive information, as I have already provided my own data. I am simply asking for my transaction history, which is crucial for my tax purposes.Unfortunately, I do not have a Case ID, as I have not been provided with one during this process. I have not received further assistance despite my numerous attempts and providing ample identification.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance scammed me for 7 500 eur
list_of_reviews.review: 23rd of March 2024 someone opened a order on Binance P2P with me on the amount 7 500 eur. I paid the order and then waited for the seller to release the deal, but seller told me to contact with him in telegram to discuss details. He sent me his telegram handle and asked to contact with him, which I did. I've contacted with the seller and asked to release crypto, since he received everything, but seller instead asked me to pay him a fee to close the order. Seller received payment in full and wanted to scam me for a fee.I've contacted with the Binance team and asked them to release crypto, because seller didn't want to do it and I had a proof of him being a scammer. Binance decided to ask for proof from seller and... That's it. 3 months passed and they still wasting my time waiting for the seller to provide ANY evidence. Seller one time provided invalid evidence of him logging into the bank and showing ALMOST zero balance, claiming that he never received anything, but he never really show the transaction history (he didn't even go to transaction history in the app) and ignored all the Binance requests to do so. From the other side, I provided Binance with all the evidence of payment being completed and received by the seller's bank, including evidence of seller confirming he received everything in full and just waiting for me to pay him a fee.So, 3 months passed, Binance has all the evidence of seller being a scammer, who received all the money, and they still decided to freeze crypto and not letting me get my money.Seller is still requesting me to pay him a fee and never answer Binance requests to provide ANY proof.That's it folks. If you work with Binance p2p, be sure to understand that Binance will do everything to save themselves and they don't care about your funds. Even if you paid, even if you provided all the evidence, they don't care. They are going to freeze your money forever while probably earning by using them on their platform, and you are just going to wait for eternity, for nothing.Oh, and yeah, they don't even care I am from Ukraine and that I really need this money... This is a HUGE amount of money they are freezing and they do nothing for me to receive my money back.Thank you, Binance, for robbing me for 7500 eur!Never trust in this company, never use their services, they don't care about you and your funds!My p2p order number on Binance platform is 20604863135175593984Update 14 Jul 2024:I provided all the evidence once again with fresh video proof, and the binance support confirmed in the appeal chat that they are releasing the order, but... They are "releasing" it already a week :)) They are literally confirmed in the chat that the order is being released, and they still didn't release me my crypto... I am asking support when are they going to really release the deal, but they keep extending the appeal for another 24 hours, and then another 24 hours, and then another 48 HOURS, etc..! Terrible support, terrible service!Update 18 Jul 2024:The order was released, but now the support froze my funds and asked me to revert them to scammer. I PAID IN FULL FOR THE DEAL, and now they want to be DOUBLE PAY! ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! I provided all of the evidence ONCE AGAIN that I paid completely, and Binance asked me to wait for the scam-seller to confirm that there is everything OK with the payment... SERIOUSLY?! SO, I paid to this scam on YOUR platform, YOU received every proof from me that the payment was done, YOU made me wait 4 months already, YOU received the proof that seller IS a scammer, AND NOW you want me to wait for him to confirm if everything is ok?!?!?!?! This platform is a b*llh*t. Binance DOES NOT care about your funds, about your payments, they don't care about YOU! They are torchuring you for months and even further, until you give up on your funds. NEVER TRUST this platform. NEVER USE this scam-binance platform!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Won't let you sell your assets!
list_of_reviews.review: Binance used to be my go to platform but now they're absolute crooks! They've made it nearly impossible to sell your crypto on the platform, they've made all the settings really confusing. You can't just 'sell' anymore. I had LTC worth around £80 it wouldn't let me sell, so I converted it to BNB which then says it has a minimum number of coins which I didn't have so then I converted it to DOGE and then there is no sell option, when I go to sell it says I have no DOGE! You have to move it from spot account to funding account or something and even when you do that it still doesn't allow you to sell to the market but you have to use their P2P platform which then offers £50. At this I've lost the will to live and just accepted the price and sold but no payment was received. The app had a 2 hour timer for the payment to be made, I woke up and checked after some 10 hours and still no payment. The option I have is to 'confirm payment received' If you go to their support it's just a bot offering you loads of support blogs depending on what you type.Thank god it's only £80, if this was my main account I'd be losing my hair! Just dreadful!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance scammed me for 7 500 eur (update)
list_of_reviews.review: 23rd of March 2024 someone opened a order on Binance P2P with me on the amount 7 500 eur. I paid the order and then waited for the seller to release the deal, but seller told me to contact with him in telegram to discuss details. He sent me his telegram handle and asked to contact with him, which I did. I've contacted with the seller and asked to release crypto, since he received everything, but seller instead asked me to pay him a fee to close the order. Seller received payment in full and wanted to scam me for a fee.I've contacted with the Binance team and asked them to release crypto, because seller didn't want to do it and I had a proof of him being a scammer. Binance decided to ask for proof from seller and... That's it. 3 months passed and they still wasting my time waiting for the seller to provide ANY evidence. Seller one time provided invalid evidence of him logging into the bank and showing ALMOST zero balance, claiming that he never received anything, but he never really show the transaction history (he didn't even go to transaction history in the app) and ignored all the Binance requests to do so. From the other side, I provided Binance with all the evidence of payment being completed and received by the seller's bank, including evidence of seller confirming he received everything in full and just waiting for me to pay him a fee.So, 3 months passed, Binance has all the evidence of seller being a scammer, who received all the money, and they still decided to freeze crypto and not letting me get my money.Seller is still requesting me to pay him a fee and never answer Binance requests to provide ANY proof.That's it folks. If you work with Binance p2p, be sure to understand that Binance will do everything to save themselves and they don't care about your funds. Even if you paid, even if you provided all the evidence, they don't care. They are going to freeze your money forever while probably earning by using them on their platform, and you are just going to wait for eternity, for nothing.Oh, and yeah, they don't even care I am from Ukraine and that I really need this money... This is a HUGE amount of money they are freezing and they do nothing for me to receive my money back.Thank you, Binance, for robbing me for 7500 eur!Never trust in this company, never use their services, they don't care about you and your funds!My p2p order number on Binance platform is 20604863135175593984Update 14 Jul 2024:I provided all the evidence once again with fresh video proof, and the binance support confirmed in the appeal chat that they are releasing the order, but... They are "releasing" it already a week :)) They are literally confirmed in the chat that the order is being released, and they still didn't release me my crypto... I am asking support when are they going to really release the deal, but they keep extending the appeal for another 24 hours, and then another 24 hours, and then another 48 HOURS, etc..! Terrible support, terrible service!Update 18 Jul 2024:The order was released, but now the support froze my funds and asked me to revert them to scammer. I PAID IN FULL FOR THE DEAL, and now they want to be DOUBLE PAY! ARE YOU KIDDING ME?! I provided all of the evidence ONCE AGAIN that I paid completely, and Binance asked me to wait for the scam-seller to confirm that there is everything OK with the payment... SERIOUSLY?! SO, I paid to this scam on YOUR platform, YOU received every proof from me that the payment was done, YOU made me wait 4 months already, YOU received the proof that seller IS a scammer, AND NOW you want me to wait for him to confirm if everything is ok?!?!?!?! This platform is a b*llh*t.Binance DOES NOT care about your funds, about your payments, they don't care about YOU! They are torchuring you for months and even further, until you give up on your funds.NEVER TRUST this platform. NEVER USE this scam-binance platform!UPDATE 24 JULY 2024:Another week has passed and I was requested to provide another bunch of SAME proofs AGAIN. Support keeps waiting for a response from the scam-seller, and it doesn't seem they understand that no response (and valid proofs) will be provided from the scammer, but still they decide to keep my money frozen for over 4 months now... I am tired and just want to receive my money back. This is a terrible experience, support does nothing but to request for more proofs from you, wasting your time and doing nothing else. This platform is a total scam. I WILL NEVER USE IT AGAIN! UNFREEZE MY MONEY AND LET ME BE, SCAMMERS!DO NOT KEEP YOUR FUNDS ON THIS PLATFORM! If you top up your balance there, your money don't belong to you anymore...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Won't let you sell your assets!
list_of_reviews.review: Binance used to be my go to platform but now they're absolute crooks! They've made it nearly impossible to sell your crypto on the platform, they've made all the settings really confusing. You can't just 'sell' anymore. I had LTC worth around £80 it wouldn't let me sell, so I converted it to BNB which then says it has a minimum number of coins which I didn't have so then I converted it to DOGE and then there is no sell option, when I go to sell it says I have no DOGE! You have to move it from spot account to funding account or something and even when you do that it still doesn't allow you to sell to the market but you have to use their P2P platform which then offers £50. At this I've lost the will to live and just accepted the price and sold but no payment was received. The app had a 2 hour timer for the payment to be made, I woke up and checked after some 10 hours and still no payment. The option I have is to 'confirm payment received' If you go to their support it's just a bot offering you loads of support blogs depending on what you type.Thank god it's only £80, if this was my main account I'd be losing my hair! Just dreadful!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor Customer service and issues with your platform
list_of_reviews.review: Request Numbers: 125726059 / 125120031It's been almost a month since access to P2P has been blocked, while all my friends are able to access it normally. I contacted support to understand the issue, thinking it was related to my account. The first time, I was told it was a technical problem; the second time, that the team was still working on it; and the third time, I was just given an excuse that the euro (€) isn't traded much on the platform. Your agents can't seem to come up with new excuses due to your incompetence in providing a valid reason. The euro isn't the only currency being traded, and on top of that, the option to sell cryptocurrencies is also unavailable. I reached out via Instagram and on the platform, but the worst part is that you don't even bother to follow up with your customers by email. Disappointing, as I used to really like the platform and even recommended it to my friends and family.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been using Binance since early…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using Binance since early 2018, never had any issues only had great expierence but recently they asked me to answer some questions to keep using my account. I answered them and there has been no changes to my account but it said my assurance review failed. Now I have been asked to leave the platform and withdraw all my assets. I've contacted support multiple times but no response.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst customer service on p2p
list_of_reviews.review: In the past binance p2p was very reliable. However it continues to change for the worst. I have an appeal on order number 22659129461055528960 from 20th August 2024. The customer support keeps taking me round and round.. I shared all the proof bank statements receipts screenshots video recording proof but still no help. My counterparty is always unresponsive or sending 1 pdf and refused to send the video from the start to now. The customer service asked me to have proof in writing from the bank that the payment was success which I did and sent to them. But still case not solved. I really think that Binance is now in collaboration with scammers

list_of_reviews.review_title: Logging in is the most difficult…
list_of_reviews.review: Logging in is the most difficult experience, and not for your own protection. Imagine needing to access your assets and their "liveness check" just goes NAH BRUH. Use other platforms, this is a scam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My overall conclusion
list_of_reviews.review: 2 things I've experienced with the Binance trading platform Firstly there is a high probability you may experience losing money either by buying in what you may consider was a good entry point followed by and paying a rather hefty exit fee for every trade and losing to dumps yourve invested in.Secondly  After losing multiple trades you may start to experience regret doubt disappointment or even failure due to losing your hard earned cash on a platform designed to rape your assets  Final conclusion After 10 years I have taken into consideration that I have lost trust in this platform and can confirm first hand it unfairness and manipulated algorithms over the past 3 years have been a disaster. The pumps and dumps on favored coins are manipulated and I am 100% sure it  has found a way to continuously deplete portfolios. To any novice trader I recommend steering clear from this platform  it will dump on your buy ins and pump on your exits and not even bat an eye lid at your loses.Do not believe for one second the binance platform is fair ...it will crash on your buy ins on purpose and one only needs to experience the manipulation first hand. You will notice by the bad feedback that I am not the only one  being impacted by these repetitive scams. Do not think for one second this platform is working for your best interests because I can assure you like many others it also wants to hang you out to dry Good luck

list_of_reviews.review: Was good exchange and I was praising it alot before.That was for years untill first problem arised:My Binance and email accounts were hacked and Binance assisted criminal, by letting him use email confirmation instead of Yubico passkey(2FA), which was always used. list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor Customer service and issues with your platform
list_of_reviews.review: Request Numbers: 125726059 / 125120031It's been almost a month since access to P2P has been blocked, while all my friends are able to access it normally. I contacted support to understand the issue, thinking it was related to my account. The first time, I was told it was a technical problem; the second time, that the team was still working on it; and the third time, I was just given an excuse that the euro (€) isn't traded much on the platform. Your agents can't seem to come up with new excuses due to your incompetence in providing a valid reason. The euro isn't the only currency being traded, and on top of that, the option to sell cryptocurrencies is also unavailable. I reached out via Instagram and on the platform, but the worst part is that you don't even bother to follow up with your customers by email. Disappointing, as I used to really like the platform and even recommended it to my friends and family.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My overall conclusion

The pumps and dumps on favored coins are manipulated and I am 100% sure it  has found a way to continuously deplete portfolios. To any novice trader I recommend steering clear from this platform  it will dump on your buy ins and pump on your exits and not even bat an eye lid at your loses.Do not believe for one second the binance platform is fair ...it will crash on your buy ins on purpose and one only needs to experience the manipulation first hand. Do not think for one second this platform is working for your best interests because I can assure you like many others it also wants to hang you out to dry Good luck

list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor Customer service and issues with your platform
list_of_reviews.review: Request Numbers: 125726059 / 125120031It's been almost a month since access to P2P has been blocked, while all my friends are able to access it normally. list_of_reviews.review_title: Binance’s Recent Actions: A Disappointing Turn for Privacy and Integrity
list_of_reviews.review: I have been deeply disappointed by Binance’s recent behavior, particularly their unjust actions towards Palestinian users. Instead of providing them with a simple, fair process to withdraw their assets through P2P and then close their accounts, Binance has chosen to freeze their funds without any prior warning or explanation. This kind of behavior is unacceptable from a platform that claims to be global and transparent.What concerns me even more is the troubling alignment Binance seems to be showing with certain geopolitical agendas, particularly in favor of the Israeli occupation. This makes me seriously question their stance on privacy, fairness, and human rights. Why is a global platform choosing to act in this way, especially when there are simple solutions that don’t involve freezing accounts without any prior warning?I had considered moving my assets to Binance, believing it to be a safe and reputable platform. However, seeing how they’ve treated Palestinians and other users in similar geopolitical situations, like what happened with Russia, I have serious doubts about their integrity. Although I am not from Palestine, I believe strongly in the right to privacy and fairness for all, regardless of nationality or political situation.I currently hold a small amount of capital on Binance, but given their recent actions, I’m hesitant to increase my involvement with them. I am left wondering: how can a company that claims to respect privacy and security act in such a manner?━━━━━━◇◆◇━━━━━━⫸Update on Binance  response⮑ Reply to the response message related to BinanceHelloThank you for your reply, but unfortunately, what you mentioned is not accurate. I have evidence and images that prove the freezing of accounts was not limited to illicit funds, as you claim. Many regular users had their accounts frozen and their funds seized without any prior warning, and these accounts had no connection to any illegal activities.Your actions contradict the transparency that is expected from a global platform like Binance and damage the trust users once had in you. The misleading information Binance is spreading regarding this matter is unacceptable. Attempting to justify these actions as part of anti-money laundering regulations is a weak excuse, especially when users were not even given proper notifications or clear procedures before their accounts were frozen.I will be sharing the evidence I have, and I expect Binance to clarify the situation transparently instead of providing vague responses that attempt to justify infringing on users' rightsUnfortunately, the Trustpilot website does not provide a feature to upload media, so I will adjust this response

list_of_reviews.review_title: dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to express my deep concern and dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents, CS Jacopo, during a discussion related to a transaction issue raised by one of my clients.To provide context, a client—someone I have a close professional relationship with—filed a complaint against me regarding a transaction, which was not accurate in its entirety. As a result, my Binance account was flagged and subsequently blocked. I reached out to customer support, where I was instructed to provide the conversation and supporting evidence, which I did. Moreover, I had explained that we were prepared to return the funds in question to the client, but the individual in question had signed a contract agreeing not to withdraw funds within the first 10 days. Despite this, I was still willing to refund her as a gesture of goodwill. What deeply upset me was CS Jacopo’s demand for me to record a video of myself, holding my ID, stating that I wanted to pay her back. This was not only unnecessary but also insulting, especially given my history and reputation on your platform. I kindly ask that you review my account history, including any P2P transactions or other activities, to confirm that there have never been any reports of scams or issues. Additionally, this entire situation has caused me to seriously reconsider my relationship with Binance. If such treatment continues, I will be compelled to move the 500+ clients I brought to Binance, along with my 62 employees, to another blockchain platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could leave a 0-star review I…
list_of_reviews.review: If I could leave a 0-star review I would. I was the victim of a clear scam through Binance's P2P platform and Binance sided with the scammer at the end of a very stressful week, the scammer, a man by the name of Federico Gorga (known for dubious digital behaviour), was able to exploit weaknesses in their security. Rather than owing to the weakness in their security protocols, they sided with a clear case of fraud. I am currently looing for alternative platforms to Binance and would recommend to anyone else that they do the same. The order was order 22664671047160545280, the seller, provided a misleading binance handle from which he provided bank details. Once I performed the transfer the seller claimed I had not spoken to him on his correct TG channel. Binance support insisted that I did no intearact with the seller on TG however they have not shown any proof that this person was not the seller. They concluded their investigation on assumptions alone.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Pessima esperienza
list_of_reviews.review: In sintesi : mi chiedono 5861 € per ricevere i miei 4.409 bitcoin. Se non pago in anticipo versando sul wallet digitale trattengono il trasferimento. Ecco ultima e-mail : Proceed by making a fiat deposit of 5861 EUR on your Binance account.Once the fiat deposit is available on your Binance spot, transfer the requested amount on your Binance internal wallet in order to validate the incoming amount in Bitcoin.Once this fee has been paid, the transfers to you will be unblocked and you can continue your activities freely.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Assets placed on unavailable
list_of_reviews.review: Open my account and realized that only about 10 percent of my total USDT is available for use and the rest of the 90 percent is on unavailable mode. So this means that I can only deposit successfully as much as I want but I can not withdraw or move the funds or assets once I deposit. Due to trust I hardly open the account but as at now this is very very uncomfortable. On dashboard I see all my funds but most of my funds are hidden secretly in unavailable.I have no open orders on trade margin or p2p. I have never deposited USDT all my USDT was converted from other assets on Binance. I have no bank transfer history no buy and sell with card history. I have never bought ustd with p2p. I spoke to CS on Binance and the words are account under review this will take substantial amount of time. What does substantial amount of time mean ? I seriously thought it was a mistake that could be corrected once I reach CS but I was tossed from one CS to another severally until the solution they gave me was to wait for some substantial amount of time.what does substantial amount of time mean ? No, I just went into earn, I have no earn history. It even started showing me tutorials I have never even been in the earn section it’s even telling me to subscribe.Displaced together with my family in Ukraine during this war this is not a stress I can handle mentally as we have already been through a lot

list_of_reviews.review_title: Discriminatory Verification Terms
list_of_reviews.review: No way to get verified as an H1B foreign national. They do not accept a valid US Driving Licence as it says "Limited-Term" and they do not accept I-797 which is a valid work authorization document. Denying over 600,000 individuals from using the service by not accepting valid US documents is discriminatory.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Seized assets
list_of_reviews.review: This company is trash, they just violated everything that crypto stands for and seized the assets of every Palestinian at the behest of the apartheid state of Israel. Remove all your assets now, it does not matter what side you are on, they can never be trusted again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been using this exchange for a…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using this exchange for a long time, but I designed a logo for a person for 80 dollars and he sent bitcoin to my BTC address in Binance and Binance stated that they confiscated 160 USDT in my account and temporarily closed my account. When I asked them, the sender's address was on the blacklist and that's why they closed my account. My account has been locked for exactly 45 days and I cannot withdraw the money in it. Most likely, Binance confiscates people's money with such excuses. I contacted support about 6 or 7 times, but they always delay me and keep saying a different day for when my account will be opened. I have never seen such a stock exchange. I really cannot pay my dues for days. I am in a difficult situation, so I beg Binance and humiliate myself.. my case id is 126759744

list_of_reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with my experience
list_of_reviews.review: For me, everything works like a charm with Binance.The customer service is always available and helpful. The fees are the lowest out there.Great exchange It is true that my account has some restrictions due to my place of residence, but I am satisfied. One of my favorite platforms that I use

list_of_reviews.review_title: dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to express my deep concern and dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents, CS Jacopo, during a discussion related to a transaction issue raised by one of my clients.To provide context, a client—someone I have a close professional relationship with—filed a complaint against me regarding a transaction, which was not accurate in its entirety. As a result, my Binance account was flagged and subsequently blocked. I reached out to customer support, where I was instructed to provide the conversation and supporting evidence, which I did. Moreover, I had explained that we were prepared to return the funds in question to the client, but the individual in question had signed a contract agreeing not to withdraw funds within the first 10 days. Despite this, I was still willing to refund her as a gesture of goodwill. What deeply upset me was CS Jacopo’s demand for me to record a video of myself, holding my ID, stating that I wanted to pay her back. This was not only unnecessary but also insulting, especially given my history and reputation on your platform. I kindly ask that you review my account history, including any P2P transactions or other activities, to confirm that there have never been any reports of scams or issues. Additionally, this entire situation has caused me to seriously reconsider my relationship with Binance. If such treatment continues, I will be compelled to move the 500+ clients I brought to Binance, along with my 62 employees, to another blockchain platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been using Binance since early…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using Binance since early 2018, never had any issues only had great expierence but recently they asked me to answer some questions to keep using my account. I answered them and there has been no changes to my account but it said my assurance review failed. Now I have been asked to leave the platform and withdraw all my assets. I've contacted support multiple times but no response.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst customer service on p2p
list_of_reviews.review: In the past binance p2p was very reliable. However it continues to change for the worst. I have an appeal on order number 22659129461055528960 from 20th August 2024. The customer support keeps taking me round and round.. I shared all the proof bank statements receipts screenshots video recording proof but still no help. My counterparty is always unresponsive or sending 1 pdf and refused to send the video from the start to now. list_of_reviews.review_title: My overall conclusion

Like many others I have come to understand the losses occur on entry points and exit fees.After 10 years of owning crypto  I have taken into consideration that I have lost trust in this platform and can confirm first hand that its unfair and manipulated algorithms have found a way to deplete portfolios. I recommend steering clear from this platform, due to experiencing more than my fair share of pumps and dumps. I literally mean the amount of times it will dump on your buy ins and pump on your exit points is irrefutable evidence there is some kind of foul play going on.Do not believe for one second the binance platform is fair ... like many others have experienced  it will hang you out to dry and not even bat an eyelidGood luck

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is fake company binance.com.

Other person to which I sell my dollar he after take my dollars call the bank and say he mistakenly send money to other person (me) and he refund his money from my bank account to his bank account.Simply I say the other person which is merchant take my dollars free of cost. list_of_reviews.review_title: Logging in is the most difficult…

list_of_reviews.review_title: Still a complicated platform

Ecco ultima e-mail : Proceed by making a fiat deposit of 5861 EUR on your Binance account.Once the fiat deposit is available on your Binance spot, transfer the requested amount on your Binance internal wallet in order to validate the incoming amount in Bitcoin.Once this fee has been paid, the transfers to you will be unblocked and you can continue your activities freely.
