list_of_reviews.review_title: Assets placed on unavailable
list_of_reviews.review: Open my account and realized that only about 10 percent of my total USDT is available for use and the rest of the 90 percent is on unavailable mode. So this means that I can only deposit successfully as much as I want but I can not withdraw or move the funds or assets once I deposit. Due to trust I hardly open the account but as at now this is very very uncomfortable. On dashboard I see all my funds but most of my funds are hidden secretly in unavailable.I have no open orders on trade margin or p2p. I have never deposited USDT all my USDT was converted from other assets on Binance. I have no bank transfer history no buy and sell with card history. I have never bought ustd with p2p. I spoke to CS on Binance and the words are account under review this will take substantial amount of time. What does substantial amount of time mean ? I seriously thought it was a mistake that could be corrected once I reach CS but I was tossed from one CS to another severally until the solution they gave me was to wait for some substantial amount of time.what does substantial amount of time mean ? No, I just went into earn, I have no earn history. It even started showing me tutorials I have never even been in the earn section it’s even telling me to subscribe.Displaced together with my family in Ukraine during this war this is not a stress I can handle mentally as we have already been through a lot

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have been using this exchange for a…
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using this exchange for a long time, but I designed a logo for a person for 80 dollars and he sent bitcoin to my BTC address in Binance and Binance stated that they confiscated 160 USDT in my account and temporarily closed my account. When I asked them, the sender's address was on the blacklist and that's why they closed my account. My account has been locked for exactly 45 days and I cannot withdraw the money in it. Most likely, Binance confiscates people's money with such excuses. I contacted support about 6 or 7 times, but they always delay me and keep saying a different day for when my account will be opened. I have never seen such a stock exchange. I really cannot pay my dues for days. I am in a difficult situation, so I beg Binance and humiliate myself.. my case id is 126759744

Denying over 600,000 individuals from using the service by not accepting valid US documents is discriminatory.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst customer service on p2p
list_of_reviews.review: In the past binance p2p was very reliable. However it continues to change for the worst. I have an appeal on order number 22659129461055528960 from 20th August 2024. The customer support keeps taking me round and round.. I shared all the proof bank statements receipts screenshots video recording proof but still no help. The customer service asked me to have proof in writing from the bank that the payment was success which I did and sent to them. But still case not solved. I really think that Binance is now in collaboration with scammers

list_of_reviews.review_title: My overall conclusion
list_of_reviews.review: There is a high probability you will experience your portfolio losing hundreds or possibly even thousands while  trading on the Binance platform. Like many others I have come to understand the losses occur on entry points and exit fees.After 10 years of owning crypto  I have taken into consideration that I have lost trust in this platform and can confirm first hand that its unfair and manipulated algorithms have found a way to deplete portfolios. I recommend steering clear from this platform, due to experiencing more than my fair share of pumps and dumps. I literally mean the amount of times it will dump on your buy ins and pump on your exit points is irrefutable evidence there is some kind of foul play going on.Do not believe for one second the binance platform is fair ... like many others have experienced  it will hang you out to dry and not even bat an eyelidGood luck

list_of_reviews.review_title: Still a complicated platform
list_of_reviews.review: After solving issue with sending funds to other wallet, customer support solved my issue.As soon as I know I can send funds home to my bank account, I will consider more stars.Binance website is still, for me, pretty confusing website, however for some people, a lot of options.It is a bit hard to get through to customer service unless you know how to process. I understand that there is some kind of "barrierer", to avoid too much spam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to express my deep concern and dissatisfaction regarding a recent interaction with one of your customer support agents, CS Jacopo, during a discussion related to a transaction issue raised by one of my clients.To provide context, a client—someone I have a close professional relationship with—filed a complaint against me regarding a transaction, which was not accurate in its entirety. As a result, my Binance account was flagged and subsequently blocked. I reached out to customer support, where I was instructed to provide the conversation and supporting evidence, which I did. Moreover, I had explained that we were prepared to return the funds in question to the client, but the individual in question had signed a contract agreeing not to withdraw funds within the first 10 days. Despite this, I was still willing to refund her as a gesture of goodwill. What deeply upset me was CS Jacopo’s demand for me to record a video of myself, holding my ID, stating that I wanted to pay her back. This was not only unnecessary but also insulting, especially given my history and reputation on your platform. I kindly ask that you review my account history, including any P2P transactions or other activities, to confirm that there have never been any reports of scams or issues. Additionally, this entire situation has caused me to seriously reconsider my relationship with Binance. If such treatment continues, I will be compelled to move the 500+ clients I brought to Binance, along with my 62 employees, to another blockchain platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Cryptocurrency Trading: A Rigged Game Controlled by Big Players, Leaving Retail Traders Powerless
list_of_reviews.review: Binance may be the largest trading platform, but they never openly cheat users. However, behind the scenes, Binance allegedly shares traders' real short-long positions, leverage, and liquidation levels with large whale teams. This leads to sudden pumps and dumps in the altcoin market, making it clear that true support and resistance don't really exist.For instance, if a trader opens a large long position, the whales manipulate the market to dump prices, triggering liquidation. These whales use AI-powered software to track every move and execute trades on their behalf.Trading in cryptocurrencies is no different than handing your money directly to someone else. The entire crypto trading game is rigged, and it's all fake. The big players control the market, while retail traders are left at their mercy.

I was the victim of a clear scam through Binance's P2P platform and Binance sided with the scammer at the end of a very stressful week, the scammer, a man by the name of Federico Gorga (known for dubious digital behaviour), was able to exploit weaknesses in their security. I am currently looing for alternative platforms to Binance and would recommend to anyone else that they do the same. The order was order 22664671047160545280, the seller, provided a misleading binance handle from which he provided bank details. Once I performed the transfer the seller claimed I had not spoken to him on his correct TG channel. Binance support insisted that I did no intearact with the seller on TG however they have not shown any proof that this person was not the seller. They concluded their investigation on assumptions alone.

list_of_reviews.review_title: 3 years of loyalty but account terminated
list_of_reviews.review: It used to be good but now it has one of the worst policies in the crypto world and surprisingly hidden policies. I was a binance user for more than 3 years, turnover of more than a million dollars during that tenure and suddenly in july 2024 my account was permanently suspended without being given a justification of which term or condition i violated. Although i was allowed to move all my funds to an external wallet or exchange but why was i permanently terminated?. I applied to reinstate my account because i have 3 years of crypto trading history attached to my account but even my request was rejected and the decision of my account termination was upheld. This scenario really didn't just let me down on binance but i now have serious trust issues with these crypto exchanges.

Rather than owing to the weakness in their security protocols, they sided with a clear case of fraud. I am currently looing for alternative platforms to Binance and would recommend to anyone else that they do the same. The order was order 22664671047160545280, the seller, provided a misleading binance handle from which he provided bank details. Once I performed the transfer the seller claimed I had not spoken to him on his correct TG channel. Binance support insisted that I did no intearact with the seller on TG however they have not shown any proof that this person was not the seller. They concluded their investigation on assumptions alone.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Cryptocurrency Trading: A Rigged Game Controlled by Big Players, Leaving Retail Traders Powerless
list_of_reviews.review: Binance may be the largest trading platform, but they never openly cheat users. However, behind the scenes, Binance allegedly shares traders' real short-long positions, leverage, and liquidation levels with large whale teams. This leads to sudden pumps and dumps in the altcoin market, making it clear that true support and resistance don't really exist.For instance, if a trader opens a large long position, the whales manipulate the market to dump prices, triggering liquidation. These whales use AI-powered software to track every move and execute trades on their behalf.Trading in cryptocurrencies is no different than handing your money directly to someone else. The entire crypto trading game is rigged, and it's all fake. The big players control the market, while retail traders are left at their mercy.____________________________________You can't help me. Yesterday, I not only deactivated my Binance account, but I also communicated with your support team and permanently deleted my Binance Plus account and financial information.Your cryptocurrency marketplace is completely FAKE. It thrives on false promotion. None of the tokens or projects have any true ownership identity or physical office location.All altcoins tokens are created in bathrooms, bedrooms, bars or Social media platforms. Every day, new altcoins are born just to take money from small traders. Binance and their invisible large whales team control the entire market, manipulating the system, with the sole intention of liquidating traders and stealing their money.This is why only Binance’s owner gets richer every day. He hasn't invented anything like Google, Facebook, Tesla, Amazon, or Nvidia, but he's still becoming wealthier because he and his team are running a money-rigging game on the Binance exchange.I hope that soon, the U.S. Senate will pass laws to stop this market manipulation on Binance and hold your owner and team accountable for their actions.I urge everyone to stop joining and trading on Binance, and protect your money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: 3 years of loyalty but account terminated
list_of_reviews.review: It used to be good but now it has one of the worst policies in the crypto world and surprisingly hidden policies. I was a binance user for more than 3 years, turnover of more than a million dollars during that tenure and suddenly in july 2024 my account was permanently suspended without being given a justification of which term or condition i violated. Although i was allowed to move all my funds to an external wallet or exchange but why was i permanently terminated?. I applied to reinstate my account because i have 3 years of crypto trading history attached to my account but even my request was rejected and the decision of my account termination was upheld. This scenario really didn't just let me down on binance but i now have serious trust issues with these crypto exchanges.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware of Binance's Shady Withdrawal Practices
list_of_reviews.review: I had a disappointing experience with Binance. I only needed 2 TON to transfer to my Tonkeeper wallet for testing purposes. Before purchasing, I checked Binance’s minimum withdrawal limit, which was listed as 0.9 TON. However, after buying the 2 TON, I noticed they suddenly increased the minimum withdrawal limit to 6 TON! This feels misleading and unfair. As long as there are enough funds to cover withdrawal fees, there shouldn't be arbitrary limits, especially from a platform claiming to support crypto freedom. They essentially want to force me to buy more TON (which I don’t need) just to withdraw my funds. To make matters worse, I contacted their support team to address this issue, and they closed my ticket without providing a response. Extremely frustrating!    the case ID for your inquiry is  1286883

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account Suspended & Funds locked for no reason
list_of_reviews.review: I never thought I could have a problem with Binance after 3 years of no issues. I have used the platform and most of its features for while and I gained their trust only for them to block my account for no stated reason. I thought at first, it's a security concern since they immediately blocked my account after I made a big deposit, which I understand and I thought by chatting with Support team they would verify whatever they need and unlock my account. However, they informed me that they have no information in regards to the restrictions on my account and that they will contact me in future but no apparent date or estimation of review time. When I open my app it shows that my account has been suspended until 2074 which is 50 years from now is that even normal? All my fortune is locked up for no stated reason and I was asked to be patient yet it shows 50 years. If there is a violation of terms why can't they say? If my deposit was flagged why can't they inform me because it's funny I've made even bigger deposits. I literally don't have any info from them and I officially revork my trust in them.My chat case ID # 128570040And case ID # 128634266

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware of Binance's Shady Withdrawal Practices
list_of_reviews.review: I had a disappointing experience with Binance. I only needed 2 TON to transfer to my Tonkeeper wallet for testing purposes. Before purchasing, I checked Binance’s minimum withdrawal limit, which was listed as 0.9 TON. However, after buying the 2 TON, I noticed they suddenly increased the minimum withdrawal limit to 6 TON! This feels misleading and unfair. As long as there are enough funds to cover withdrawal fees, there shouldn't be arbitrary limits, especially from a platform claiming to support crypto freedom. They essentially want to force me to buy more TON (which I don’t need) just to withdraw my funds. To make matters worse, I contacted their support team to address this issue, and they closed my ticket without providing a response. Extremely frustrating!    the case ID for your inquiry is  1286883

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer Service
list_of_reviews.review: Case id : 129804869Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer ServiceI am a large course seller, regularly handling over six figures a month and transacting more than a million dollars on Binance. Out of nowhere, Binance locked my account, freezing over half a million dollars of my funds. They claimed it was related to small transactions (less than $100 in total) from one of my customers, yet no prior warning was given.I immediately contacted Binance support, and they promised a resolution within 30 business days that deadline passed on October 17th. Despite contacting them at least 10 times, they kept repeating the same robotic response: “The team is working on it,” with zero updates or accountability. Finally, when October 17th arrived, they asked me to wait an additional four business weeks for an answer—an outrageous delay, breaking their promise and leaving my funds locked with no clear resolution in sight.On top of the delays, Binance’s customer service is appalling. I saved every chat log, and the support agents were rude, dismissive, and often ignored my questions, sending automated responses instead of genuine help.After nearly two months of waiting, I still have no access to my funds, and I’m concerned Binance may be targeting high-value accounts due to potential internal liquidity issues. This is unacceptable, and I urge anyone with large sums on Binance to think twice before trusting this platform.Avoid Binance at all costs!I Will edit my Post within the journey of me and binance , all chatlogs will be posted on my twitter incase bad experience continues to persist

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer Service
list_of_reviews.review: Case id : 129804869Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer ServiceI am a large course seller, regularly handling over six figures a month and transacting more than a million dollars on Binance. Out of nowhere, Binance locked my account, freezing over half a million dollars of my funds. They claimed it was related to small transactions (less than $100 in total) from one of my customers, yet no prior warning was given.I immediately contacted Binance support, and they promised a resolution within 30 business days that deadline passed on October 17th. Despite contacting them at least 10 times, they kept repeating the same robotic response: “The team is working on it,” with zero updates or accountability. Finally, when October 17th arrived, they asked me to wait an additional four business weeks for an answer—an outrageous delay, breaking their promise and leaving my funds locked with no clear resolution in sight.On top of the delays, Binance’s customer service is appalling. I saved every chat log, and the support agents were rude, dismissive, and often ignored my questions, sending automated responses instead of genuine help.After nearly two months of waiting, I still have no access to my funds, and I’m concerned Binance may be targeting high-value accounts due to potential internal liquidity issues. This is unacceptable, and I urge anyone with large sums on Binance to think twice before trusting this platform.Avoid Binance at all costs!I Will edit my Post within the journey of me and binance , all chatlogs will be posted on my twitter incase bad experience continues to persist

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer Service
list_of_reviews.review: Case id : 129804869Terrible Experience with Binance - BEWARE of Fund Locking & Poor Customer ServiceI am a large course seller, regularly handling over six figures a month and transacting more than a million dollars on Binance. Out of nowhere, Binance locked my account, freezing over half a million dollars of my funds. They claimed it was related to small transactions (less than $100 in total) from one of my customers, yet no prior warning was given.I immediately contacted Binance support, and they promised a resolution within 30 business days that deadline passed on October 17th. Despite contacting them at least 10 times, they kept repeating the same robotic response: “The team is working on it,” with zero updates or accountability. Finally, when October 17th arrived, they asked me to wait an additional four business weeks for an answer—an outrageous delay, breaking their promise and leaving my funds locked with no clear resolution in sight.On top of the delays, Binance’s customer service is appalling. I saved every chat log, and the support agents were rude, dismissive, and often ignored my questions, sending automated responses instead of genuine help.After nearly two months of waiting, I still have no access to my funds, and I’m concerned Binance may be targeting high-value accounts due to potential internal liquidity issues. This is unacceptable, and I urge anyone with large sums on Binance to think twice before trusting this platform.Avoid Binance at all costs!I Will edit my Post within the journey of me and binance , all chatlogs will be posted on my twitter incase bad experience continues to persist 10/23/2024 : Still no updates whatsoever , 0 emails , 0 Response , 0 follow ups. 10/24 : Customer service told me there are 0 Updates from superior team , This is really messed up . while binance replies to reviews on trustpilot , they dont do anything but give fake promises

Since I can't transfer to my Binance account until I make a transaction to my bank from my Binance account, it's because of the bank details used in my Binance account for the SEPA transfer.I want to receive funds to my Binance account in fiat currency so that I can make another withdrawal to my bank account. Please write me the exact procedure what I need to do to get this amount of money unblocked and sent to my Binance account.Best regardsMichal Hrubovčák

list_of_reviews.review_title: Crypots sent and never arrived in the same platform
list_of_reviews.review: They are basically technological scammers. If you want to lose your money, this is the place for you. There is not a single free operation, whatever you do you pay, even to deposit money you have to pay (while no forex broker dreams of making you pay on deposits). The simple conversion of currencies has a spread (which is not visible) of 2%. A small commission can be there but 2% is a huge amount for all mechanized operations at 0 cost for them.Then it happens to me to do a wrong operation, send a crypto to an address of another crypto, but always inside Binance, which is not allowed. Here too, everything is mechanized, it would be enough for the platform to block the operation from the beginning "operation not permitted" like any bank in the world does: if you make a mistake, the transfer does not send the money, you find it in your account and nothing serious.Here, however, they easily take the cryptos from your account but they do not arrive. So I call support where they are super kind, they examine the case and then tell me that the operation is wrong. Of course, I also realized, AFTER, that the operation was wrong, but at this point it is a question of recovering the cryptos that by the way moved on the same platform. At that point even more kind than before, he re-examines the case and replies that he understands my pain but "we are not capable of recovering the cryptos". Screw you. Without any technical explanation, without making it clear what happened. It was my money and if I operated with them it means that I was trusting them. list_of_reviews.review_title: Fraud and hatred

A decision was made to prevent the publication of Euro ads for the North Africa and Middle East region, so a very large number of people left their platform and headed to other platforms, and I was actually relieved of the decision because I am a verified merchant with a yellow badge. After they realized that they had lost a large segment, the decision was reversed and they returned the ads to all people except me, their authorized merchant, and they are asking for $5,500 from me, even though the decision was canceled from its roots. The unprofessional support representative, Arez, does not want to help us and resolve matters smoothly. To be clear, you are no longer the most distinguished platform and the most loyal to the customer as you actually were. Your service is now applied according to whims only, not according to a clear law and approach.My Casea/ 129867790

list_of_reviews.review_title: Crypots sent and never arrived in the same platform
list_of_reviews.review: They are basically technological scammers. If you want to lose your money, this is the place for you. There is not a single free operation, whatever you do you pay, even to deposit money you have to pay (while no forex broker dreams of making you pay on deposits). The simple conversion of currencies has a spread (which is not visible) of 2%. A small commission can be there but 2% is a huge amount for all mechanized operations at 0 cost for them.Then it happens to me to do a wrong operation, send a crypto to an address of another crypto, but always inside Binance, which is not allowed. Here too, everything is mechanized, it would be enough for the platform to block the operation from the beginning "operation not permitted" like any bank in the world does: if you make a mistake, the transfer does not send the money, you find it in your account and nothing serious.Here, however, they easily take the cryptos from your account but they do not arrive. So I call support where they are super kind, they examine the case and then tell me that the operation is wrong. Of course, I also realized, AFTER, that the operation was wrong, but at this point it is a question of recovering the cryptos that by the way moved on the same platform. At that point even more kind than before, he re-examines the case and replies that he understands my pain but "we are not capable of recovering the cryptos". Screw you. Without any technical explanation, without making it clear what happened. It was my money and if I operated with them it means that I was trusting them. You can't close with "we are not capable" we are sorry but screw you.Where did the cryptos that started but didn't get anywhere go? Did they retain them? But above all: given that these are hyper technological platforms, is it so difficult to block the operation at the beginning instead of letting it go wrong? How many cryptos have disappeared like this? Where did they go?Absolutely avoid …..The id case is 130310503 of 23 october, my true name is sabino ardito. If you can do something to recover cryptos, please do it, also retaining your expensnes, I understand there is a manual work for and a fee for you. But dont make me lose the whole amount. Thanks.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Using Binance for many years without…
list_of_reviews.review: Using Binance for many years without ANY problems. Purchasing and selling goes fine and without any problems.I believe that some of the reviews here are not a review of Binance. But from people that are got scammed by scammers pretending they are Binance. I get at least once a month an invite into a whatsapp group (and also my wife). BUT my wife doesnt have a Binance account, but according the scammers she has and they need her ID/Passport to withdraw 1.7BTC from her account...  She will directly ask me, what is this whatsapp group, I dont even have Binance. Also Binance has a statement on their website that they will never contact you via whatsapp or viber. I have reported over 80 scamming Whatsapp groups to both Whatsapp and Binance and almost all of them are taken down within days. If you see something that is too good...., check with Binance chat support first....

Please refer to my previous reviews.I have been suspended from withdrawing funds from Binance for 5 months since June 2024 without any reason.... Then on November 1, 2024, he lost consciousness while walking down the street and was diagnosed with a stroke.Yesterday, November 4, 2024, Binance requested a medical certificate and I submitted it.I am currently unable to receive treatment at the hospital because I have no money to pay off my loan interest, etc. due to the 5-month suspension of Binance withdrawals.I have begged and pleaded several times to allow me to receive treatment at the hospital starting November 1st.On November 5, 2024, I heard something shocking from the customer service center and doubted my eyes.Here is the relevant content.Binance cs: Did you get the medical report?Me: I have already submitted itMe: The doctor advised me to go to the hospital quicklyMe: He said that as time goes by, I lose more and more of my nervesBinance cs: There is no stamp. All doctors carry a stampMe: Call the hospital and ask!Me: You call and ask! If my diagnosis is fake, take all my money!Me:  I'm fighting for my health right now and living in hellish pain every day! You crazy bastard! Check all the paperwork! Call the hospital and ask!Me: Are human health issues a joke to you?Binance cs: I have had serious health issues, I know the drill. Medical reports are stampedBinance cs: No MRI or X-rays are done without proper paperworkMe: That must be your country, not this countryMe: Okay, here are all the document numbers. Call them directly and check everythingThe customer service center simply does not care about the user. I submitted a medical certificate, but they did not believe it and told me to call the hospital directly and confirm the document number.I was diagnosed with a stroke and I still see double and my left leg paralysis is getting worse.The doctor said that I need to get treatment as soon as possible to save my nerves...I am not a criminal. I have money, but I can't get treatment at the hospital. I don't have insurance.When I say I have symptoms of oxygen deficiency, dizziness, and severe paralysis, Binance says this:Please wait patiently.I feel like my physical condition is getting worse day by day and my paralysis is getting worse. So I'm just going to have to wait patiently?Then why did binance ask me to submit a medical certificate? Did binance just ask me to submit a hospital certificate because binance cs were bored?If the customer support response is copy and paste, just use a robot.

But from people that are got scammed by scammers pretending they are Binance. I get at least once a month an invite into a whatsapp group (and also my wife). BUT my wife doesnt have a Binance account, but according the scammers she has and they need her ID/Passport to withdraw 1.7BTC from her account...  She will directly ask me, what is this whatsapp group, I dont even have Binance. Also Binance has a statement on their website that they will never contact you via whatsapp or viber. I have reported over 80 scamming Whatsapp groups to both Whatsapp and Binance and almost all of them are taken down within days. If you see something that is too good...., check with Binance chat support first....

Please refer to my previous reviews.I have been suspended from withdrawing funds from Binance for 5 months since June 2024 without any reason.... Then on November 1, 2024, he lost consciousness while walking down the street and was diagnosed with a stroke.Yesterday, November 4, 2024, Binance requested a medical certificate and I submitted it.I am currently unable to receive treatment at the hospital because I have no money to pay off my loan interest, etc. due to the 5-month suspension of Binance withdrawals.I have begged and pleaded several times to allow me to receive treatment at the hospital starting November 1st.On November 5, 2024, I heard something shocking from the customer service center and doubted my eyes.Here is the relevant content.Binance cs: Did you get the medical report?Me: I have already submitted itMe: The doctor advised me to go to the hospital quicklyMe: He said that as time goes by, I lose more and more of my nervesBinance cs: There is no stamp. All doctors carry a stampMe: Call the hospital and ask!Me: You call and ask! If my diagnosis is fake, take all my money!Me:  I'm fighting for my health right now and living in hellish pain every day! You crazy bastard! Check all the paperwork! Call the hospital and ask!Me: Are human health issues a joke to you?Binance cs: I have had serious health issues, I know the drill. Medical reports are stampedBinance cs: No MRI or X-rays are done without proper paperworkMe: That must be your country, not this countryMe: Okay, here are all the document numbers. Call them directly and check everythingThe customer service center simply does not care about the user. I submitted a medical certificate, but they did not believe it and told me to call the hospital directly and confirm the document number.I was diagnosed with a stroke and I still see double and my left leg paralysis is getting worse.The doctor said that I need to get treatment as soon as possible to save my nerves...I am not a criminal. I have money, but I can't get treatment at the hospital. I don't have insurance.When I say I have symptoms of oxygen deficiency, dizziness, and severe paralysis, Binance says this:Please wait patiently.I feel like my physical condition is getting worse day by day and my paralysis is getting worse. So I'm just going to have to wait patiently?Then why did binance ask me to submit a medical certificate? Did binance just ask me to submit a hospital certificate because binance cs were bored?If the customer support response is copy and paste, just use a robot.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fraudulent actions supported by Binance Support
list_of_reviews.review: Two weeks ago, I used Binance's P2P service and was connected with an official seller named Smart OTC. They offered the service to deliver USDC after receiving 25.000,-Euros via SEPA transfer. The exchange rate of 0.93 euros per USDC seemed reasonable.However, I encountered several issues during the process I followed intensively . The verification procedures were extensive, including personally written and signed statements confirming my legal intentions dealing with crypto currencies etc. accompanied by unusual selfies holding the statements. This made me feel uncomfortable and a little concerned about the procedure. But then the real nightmare started. The seller did not acknowledge receiving my 25,000 euro transfer, even after I provided screenshots of my bank account showing the transaction. They then attempted to persuade me to cancel the order and place a new one with a significantly less favorable exchange rate.Given these circumstances, I decided to seek assistance from Binance's official support service.. To summarize the unprofessional and unsupportive events, here are some details. Despite the time constraints and even at night, I was asked to provide official bank statements, screenshots of my bank account, and a live video of accessing my banking app to show the transaction to ATC Finance UAB, the bank account mentioned by Smart OTC. Additionally, the seller attempted to persuade me to cancel the initial order,to opt for a new one with a significantly worse exchange rate and at the same time giving an official confirmation at the Binance platform that I did not pay or I had been refunded as a a reason for cancellation of the first order. During the appeal process, Binance Support suggested a reasonable solution by offering a refund. However, the seller introduced a new demand, requesting a tracking ID for my SEPA transaction. After consulting with my bank, Deutsche Bank, and conducting online research, I discovered that a tracking ID does not exist for SEPA transactions. Despite providing all this information, Binance Support terminated my appeal.Regrettably, the seller has not issued a refund or performed the currency exchange. Furthermore, they made another attempt to convince me to accept an exchange rate of 1.29 Euro/USDC. Based on these experiences, I have concluded that Smart OTC is engaging in fraudulent activities. Additionally, Binance Support appears to be siding with these fraudulent actions, which is disappointing and does not align with the concept of providing genuine support.Dr. Gerd K.
